course.title: CSI 3120 Programming Language Concepts (3 units)
course.desc: Design and evaluation criteria for programming languages. Introduction to syntactic and semantic description of programming languages. Basics of programming language implementation. Scripting languages. A comparison of design choices across programming paradigms: data objects, data types, control structures, sub-programs. Basics of concurrency.Course Component: Laboratory, Lecture, TutorialPrerequisites: CSI 2101, CSI 2120.
